name: ConversationalCommerce
0:
”Alexa, launch Conversational Commerce”
”Speakers”
”Give me a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: conversational commerce
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is the companion skill to the Conversational Commerce Conference (C3), taking place at The Four Seasons Hotel San Francisco on September 12-13, 2018.

You can ask the skill details about the conference, facts about the conversational commerce field, or you can listen to speakers tell you something about themselves in their own voice.

Find out more about the conference by visiting https://opusresearch.net/wordpress/events/ and by following @opusresearch via Twitter.

This skill was designed and built by Witlingo. For more about them, please visit www.witlingo.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
